attributes.action: Require schools to make uniforms optional
attributes.additional_details: School uniforms are uncomfortable, especially in hot summer weather, and cost a lot of money to replace. Some parents simply can’t afford a new blazer or PE kit for their children. This is an important matter that should be discussed in parliament.
attributes.background: We need to get 100000 signatures as soon as we possibly can.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/608259
